constants.name: equilibrium_gs_deviation
constants.header: List of boundary condition types for 1D transport solvers

int.name: absolute_gs_error
int.description: Absolute error on the Grad-Shafranov equation, <|Del* psi - j_tor*R / (Del* psi)|>, averaged over the plasma poloidal cross-section

int.name: root_mean_square_gs_error
int.description: Relative error on the Grad-Shafranov equation, sqrt((<Del* psi - j_tor*R / (Del* psi)>)^2 / <Del* psi> ^2), averaged over the plasma poloidal cross-section

int.name: absolute_gs_error_max
int.description: Maximum of the absolute error in the poloidal flux (see absolute_gs_error) between last and subsequent iterations
